Text: It's the eighth PC beta that wasn't meant to be released on Steam to users who pre-ordered the game. I've only got up to the third boss but it feels pretty solid. Only problem is the special spindash with Sonic/Tails keeps going one direction; if its even a bug at all.
Can anyone get Episode Metal working with the Unleashed release? I beat the game
and by Unleashed release I mean episode 1.

If someone can figure out how to make Sonic 4 Episode 2 communicate properly with the Steam API without making it unable to launch, then that should enable Episode Metal. The only reason why Episode Metal doesn't work (theoretically) is because I cut off all API access between S4E2 and Steam, in order to get it to run.

I've figured it out. Episode Metal is unlocked via a flag that is set inside the save game file. If the person who bought Episode II launches Episode II and has Episode I in their Steam account, it will set this flag to true inside the save game, thus unlocking Episode Metal. Now, all we need is said save file.

I just grabbed MDK's release that reportedly unlocks metal. I haven't gone into Windows and booted it up yet but what's apparent is that theres a "Steamclient.dll" and "Skidrow.ini" that were taken from the Generations scene release. I'll see if I can get metal working with your release through a savefile.
